meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Peter Solderitsch Paige Ormiston Andrea West Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6862.

td.p: Peter Solderitsch, a software engineer from Havertown, Pennsylvania
Paige Ormiston, a Navy JAG from Norfolk, Virginia
Andrea West, a college composition instructor from Columbia, South Carolina (whose 1-day cash winnings total $21,800)

tr.td: THE BODY SHOP
TRUE RELIGION
"LID"S
AS SEEN ON TV
RETURNS
AT THE MALL

tr.td: Andrea
Paige
Peter
THE BIG BUKOWSKI
NATIONAL HISTORIC SITES
THE NAME OF THE LAW

SOLVE FOR x
